<H2>What is the Java Grande Process?</H2>
<BR></UL></P>
<P><UL>
<LI><H2>Set of Workshops with increasing interest
</H2>
<UL>
<LI>Syracuse December 96 -- 50 participants
<LI>Las Vegas June 97        -- 100
<LI>Palo Alto February 98  -- 200
<LI>Southampton (Europe) Sept 98 -- 60
<LI>San Francisco June 99 -- 160 (First official ACM Conference)
</UL></UL><UL>
<LI><H2>Topics include compilation issues; applications; algorithms (math libraries); benchmarking; Java based programming environments(visualization); parallel computing and largest set of papers are in distributed systems 
</H2>
